Have You Been Injured By A Drunk Driver?

Many accidents can be prevented with additional care and concern. That is especially true of drunk driving wrecks. There is no excuse for those who get behind the wheel after drinking and put the lives of others on the road at risk.

If you or a loved one was injured in a drunk driving accident, we can help.

Handling Drunk Driving Auto Accident Injury Claims For 50 Years

At our Columbus firm, we have been handling these types of claims and other personal injury matters for 50 years.

When you contact us, you will talk to a lawyer on your first phone call or visit. At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, we will get to know you and learn about the circumstances of your accident and injuries.

Understanding The Law And Your Rights

The law regarding drunk driving accidents is complex. Several factors could play a part in your recovery such as:

  • Uninsured or underinsured motorist claims: If your drunk driving accident involves an uninsured or underinsured drunk driver, we can help you obtain the coverage you are entitled to under your own insurance.
  • Dram shop liability: Was tavern owner (dram shop) liability involved in the drunk driving accident? If another party served too much alcohol to an obviously impaired person, that party may share in the liability for your injuries.
  • Punitive damages: If recklessness was involved, injury victims may also be able to pursue punitive damages to punish the wrongdoer.
  • Fatalities: Individuals who have lost a loved one in a drunk driving accident are entitled to pursue specific damages in a wrongful death claim.

Our Ohio car accident attorneys will thoroughly investigate the accident, examine police reports, and pursue all possible legal avenues.

Call 614-360-2706 Today

Call or email one of our lawyers today to talk about your case. We offer a free initial consultation, and there are no legal fees unless we recover compensation for you.
